Map By 一夜回到解放前,由artesurf移植并重做触发.Translation: Map By 一夜回到解放前, ported and re-triggered by artesurf. EN Translation: Allenw @ Ozlin server

守住这里,直到水面安全.Translation: Hold this position until the water surface is safe.

水面暂时安全了，我们先暂时躲在房间里面!.Translation: The water surface is temporarily safe; let's hide in the room for now!

10秒后传送房间外面的所有玩家.Translation: In 10 seconds, teleport all players outside the room.

在这里守住一会!!!.Translation: Hold this position for a while!!!

守住这里直到桥被炸毁!!!.Translation: Hold this position until the bridge is destroyed!!!

5秒后传送不在桥上的玩家.Translation: In 5 seconds, teleport players not on the bridge.

守住这里直到车子移动.Translation: Hold this position until the vehicle moves.

在德丽莎附近守住30秒，注意不要让僵尸靠近!!!.Translation: Hold near Theresa for 30 seconds, and make sure zombies don't get close!!!

有玩家拾取了神器(在这一回合中只允许第一个拾取手枪的人使用).Translation: A player has picked up the artifact (only the first player to pick up the pistol can use it in this round).

注意，10秒后传送光圈外的所有玩家.Translation: Attention, all players outside the teleportation circle will be teleported in 10 seconds.

安全屋里面没有人类，任务失败!!!.Translation: There are no humans in the safe house, mission failed!!!

30秒后传送(不在桥上的都会被传送).Translation: In 30 seconds, teleport (everyone not on the bridge will be teleported).

前面的车挡住我们了，先守住这里!!!.Translation: The car ahead is blocking us; hold this position!!!

守住这里，楼梯马上会下降.Translation: Hold this position, the stairs will descend soon.

这里没有路了，我们先想办法修好梯子，在这里守一会.Translation: There's no way here; let's find a way to fix the ladder and hold this position for a while.

梯子修好了,快上楼梯.Translation: The ladder is fixed, quick, go up the stairs!

电梯门正在打开，在这里守一会.Translation: The elevator door is opening; hold this position for a while.

10秒后传送房间外的所有玩家.Translation: In 10 seconds, teleport all players outside the room.

10秒后传送顶层玩家.Translation: In 10 seconds, teleport players on the top floor.

直升机离开还剩20秒.Translation: 20 seconds left until the helicopter leaves.

自由模式,300秒后核爆，等待rtv换图(Survive for 300seco.Translation: Free mode, nuclear explosion in 300 seconds, waiting for RTV to change the map (Survive for 300 seconds).

电梯门被禁用，一些道路将开放(the elevator door button.Translation: The elevator door has been disabled; some paths will open.
